com.gej.input

Class GKeyBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gej.input.GKeyBoard

  • public abstract class GKeyBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can be used to note keyboard input from any class. The values are automatically updated by the GInput object.
    Author:
    Sri Harsha Chilakapati
